Title: The Tale of The Princess Kaguya
Actors: Chloë Grace Moretz, James Caan, Mary Steenburgen
Plot: Found inside a shining stalk of bamboo by an old bamboo cutter and his wife, a tiny girl grows rapidly into an exquisite young lady. The mysterious young princess enthralls all who encounter her, but ultimately she must confront h...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 13 wins & 38 nominations total
